Different Crime.Crime Name: Use of False Documents for Immigration Purpose
legal_basis: subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA)
credibility_assessment: credibility issues identified by the RPD and upheld by the RAD
refugee_status_eligibility: applicant claimed refugee status using false documents
decision_outcome: application for judicial review was allowed, matter referred back to the RAD for reconsideration
